name: Rice with Mushrooms And Peas
keywords: long-grain rice, mushroom, side dish, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1/4 pound white mushrooms, portobellos or creminis

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the rice with 1 1/2 cups water in a heavy-bottomed pot, and bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover and simmer, cooking a total of 17 minutes, until water is absorbed and rice is tender.
Meanwhile, wash, trim and slice mushrooms. Heat oil in a nonstick pan, and saute the mushrooms until they begin to give off liquid.
Two minutes before rice is cooked, stir in the mushrooms and peas and finish cooking.
